pages.text: A toggleable sigil that continuously cleanses your body of harmful afflictions. While active, negative status effects are purged at a steady LP cost.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Toggle:$() Right-click to activate/deactivate$(br)$(bold)LP Cost:$() 50 LP per effect removed$(br)$(bold)Interval:$() Once per second$(br2)While active, all negative (harmful) effects are automatically removed. The sigil will deactivate if you run out of LP.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: $(bold)Beneficial Effects:$() Only harmful effects are removed; beneficial effects like Regeneration or Strength remain.$(br2)$(bold)Efficiency:$() The cost scales with the number of effects - cleansing 3 effects costs 150 LP.$(br2)$(italic)Purity through sacrifice.$()
